titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter provides notification of the sale of one hundred bales of wool by the Residency at the usual price, but due to the risks to the East India Company from selling goods on credit in the region, he has sold them for cash and has offered a discount on the condition of prompt payment. The Resident would like this to become normal practice for trade in the future.
